block.p: Rebecca Elyse Bernstein and Eric Michael Rubenstein are to be married today by Rabbi Henry M. Weiner at Metronome, a restaurant in New York.

The bride, 27, is a certified public accountant. She oversees accounting for the touring division of SFX Entertainment, a producer of concerts and other events, in New York. She graduated cum laude from Skidmore College. She is the daughter of Roberta and Harvey Bernstein of Hazlet, N.J.

The bride, 27, is a certified public accountant. She oversees accounting for the touring division of SFX Entertainment, a producer of concerts and other events, in New York. She graduated cum laude from Skidmore College. She is the daughter of Roberta and Harvey Bernstein of Hazlet, N.J.

The bridegroom, 29, is a lawyer in New York specializing in electronic media law for VNU, a Dutch magazine company, which publishes Billboard and Hollywood Reporter magazines. He graduated from the University of Florida and received a law degree from Yeshiva University. He is a son of Sherrie and Ronald Rubenstein of Coral Springs, Fla.
